name: CASE_SPEC_ROOM
description: This table contains room special needs category choices that have been made in the case record.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ROOM_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the special room needs required for a case request.
